channel.title: [Need a EXPERIENCED NPC Coders Help]
channel.description:
k, I'm using Testscape source and I have a NPC (I'm not good with NPC Coding for the life of me, same with shop...) anyways, I had him in the Varrock East Bank since I first started running my server... and I went to change him today and I got him to say my current name was Online/Offline, But I can't move his position! I Tried, I went into Autospawn.cfg and I found him there and edited the coords. But when I tried to login, the screen stayed black and said Disconnected.
Can Anyone explain to me how to move him without this error? Thanks, and no rush, I don't think hes fond of moving! ;)

item.title: [Need a EXPERIENCED NPC Coders Help]
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

Hmm check your runserver thing when u log in and look at it.
It will probably said except in “main” java.lang.arrayexception outofbound:

and so on check that. JAVA helped me with mine.
Hes good 8)

Read full topic

item.title: [Need a EXPERIENCED NPC Coders Help]
item.dc:creator: @Poon_Toon Poon Toon
item.description:
@Poon_Toon wrote:

that’s true lol listen to Alex

Read full topic

item.title: [Need a EXPERIENCED NPC Coders Help]
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

What all did you change? If you only changed those numbers, then it must have been something before you were trying to move the NPC, because there is no possible way that doing something wrong in the autospawn could do that to your server (unless you did more than just change those numbers there). Also, be sure that there is a [tab] between the numbers and not a [space].

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: [Need a EXPERIENCED NPC Coders Help]
item.dc:creator: @krisdude krisdude
item.description:
@krisdude wrote:

Yes, thats what I do, and Text rap is off.
I don’t know whats wrong with it, I’ve never been good with NPC’s always had a friend do it for me.

Read full topic

item.title: [Need a EXPERIENCED NPC Coders Help]
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Ok, are you using the cfg file with the text wrapping off? Because if you dont it will appear to be messed. What you need to do is turn text wrap off and alter the coords exactly the way the rest of them are.

Read full topic

item.title: [Need a EXPERIENCED NPC Coders Help]
item.dc:creator: @krisdude krisdude
item.description:
@krisdude wrote:

Actually no I shouldn’t because thats what I do to change it…
I try to change its location and I get no errors when I compile it then when I turn on the server and try to log in, I get a black screen saying connection lost - attempting to ReEstablish.

and good luck asking for rep because your not getting it.

Read full topic

you should probly rep me and afro for this

item.title: [Need a EXPERIENCED NPC Coders Help]
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Move place or move like hes walking?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 04:22:08 PM[/size][hr]If you want to move place go to autospawn.cfg and change the 2 numbers after the first one.

Read full topic
